name: BEBOBLAST
description:
Made in two months for ANTONJAM 3!

Bebo the ballbuster, local Annie fanboy after witnessing the events of Punchball, goes on a quest to meet his idol, Annie Bell, destroying as much as he can on the way, just like she does!

Featuring:

-3 LEVELS!

-BEBO THE BALLBUSTER!

-HARD HAT HUDSON!

-A SPOOKY BOMB GHOST THING!

-AND MAYBE EVEN...ANNIE BELL?

CREDITS

Cactus Companion- Project lead, sprite artist

Defnotreal- Main coder

Beta Parappa- Higher quality pixel art, miscellaneous funny posting

ToasterPower777- Music

Illdie- Additional coding
